title: Bugs Squashed for Smoother Navigation Experience

topics.title: Dependency Management
topics.summary: Recent merges include updates to various dependencies, such as pnpm/action-setup and actions/github-script. These updates are crucial for maintaining the security and functionality of the application, ensuring that it runs on the latest and most secure versions of its dependencies.

topics.title: User Interface Improvements
topics.summary: Recent PRs focused on enhancing the user interface, including fixing dialog titles, improving badge text measurement accuracy, and preventing duplicate items in column selection. These changes aim to provide a more intuitive and visually appealing experience for users interacting with the application.

topics.title: Bug Fixes and Issue Resolutions
topics.summary: Multiple bug fixes have been addressed, including issues with navigation, duplicate items in selections, and dialog title mismatches. These fixes enhance the overall stability and usability of the application, providing a smoother user experience.

topics.title: Internationalization Updates
topics.summary: Several PRs have been merged to enhance internationalization support, including updates to Arabic and Chinese translations. These updates ensure that the application is accessible to a broader audience by providing accurate translations for various languages.

topics.title: Community Engagement and Feedback
topics.summary: Engagement with the community has been highlighted through discussions on Bluesky, where users are encouraged to create issues and provide feedback. This interaction fosters a collaborative environment for improving the application based on user input.
